response.original_title: California Fix: Resolving McAfee "Error 0x80040154" & COM Registry Failures
response.overview: McAfee California Helpline: 1-855-508-8955 The Issue: A "Class Not Registered" error that freezes the McAfee UI. Technical Fix: This is a COM (Component Object Model) failure. You must manually re-register the McProxy.dll using the regsvr32 command in an elevated prompt. This restores the link between the interface and the scanning engine. FAQs: Q: Why is my McAfee unresponsive in California? A: Your Windows Registry has lost the "Class ID" for McAfee. Call for Reset: 1-855-508-8955. Q: Can I fix this without a reinstall? A: Yes, a manual DLL registration usually works. Help: 1-855-508-8955.
response.tagline: California Fix: Resolving McAfee "Error 0x80040154" & COM Registry Failures
response.title: California Fix: Resolving McAfee "Error 0x80040154" & COM Registry Failures
